mapper.insert: insert into qna(mid, qtitle, qcontent, qnaimg, qnathumimg) values (#{mid}, #{qtitle}, #{qcontent}, #{qnaimg}, #{qnathumimg})
mapper.select: select count(*) total from qna where mid=#{mid}
select qid, mid, qtitle, qcontent, qdate from qna where qid=#{qid}
mapper.update: update qna set qtitle=#{qtitle}, qcontent=#{qcontent} where qid=#{qid}
